API.pytesser package¶

Submodules¶

API.pytesser.errors module¶

Test for exceptions raised in the tesseract.exe logfile

exception API.pytesser.errors.Tesser_General_Exception¶

Bases: exceptions.Exception

exception API.pytesser.errors.Tesser_Invalid_Filetype¶

Bases: API.pytesser.errors.Tesser_General_Exception

API.pytesser.errors.check_for_errors(logfile='tesseract.log')¶

API.pytesser.pytesser module¶

OCR in Python using the Tesseract engine from Google http://code.google.com/p/pytesser/ by Michael J.T. O’Kelly V 0.0.1, 3/10/07

API.pytesser.pytesser.call_tesseract(input_filename, output_filename)¶

Calls external tesseract.exe on input file (restrictions on types), outputting output_filename+’txt’

API.pytesser.pytesser.image_file_to_string(filename, cleanup=True, graceful_errors=True)¶

Applies tesseract to filename; or, if image is incompatible and graceful_errors=True, converts to compatible format and then applies tesseract. Fetches resulting text. If cleanup=True, delete scratch files after operation.

API.pytesser.pytesser.image_to_string(im, cleanup=True)¶

Converts im to file, applies tesseract, and fetches resulting text. If cleanup=True, delete scratch files after operation.

API.pytesser.util module¶

Utility functions for processing images for delivery to Tesseract

API.pytesser.util.image_to_scratch(im, scratch_image_name)¶

Saves image in memory to scratch file. .bmp format will be read correctly by Tesseract

API.pytesser.util.perform_cleanup(scratch_image_name, scratch_text_name_root)¶

Clean up temporary files from disk

API.pytesser.util.retrieve_text(scratch_text_name_root)¶
